forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Light Snow
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow after 5pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 33. Southwest wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow before 3am. Cloudy, with a low around 26. Southwest wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible.

weather_report:
As the day unfolds in Boston, a gentle chill hangs in the air, tempered by a hint of the sun's muted glow. The atmosphere is a canvas of cloud, softening the edges of the cityscape, while whispers of snow flurry in on the southwestern breeze. The forecast hints at the drama of winter, with the evening promising an embrace of white—just enough to coat the ground and bring a layer of enchantment to the familiar. One might find the day laced with a certain aesthetic, a blend of muted hues and a quiet anticipation for the snow to come.

As you venture out into this crisp urban winter, consider dressing in layers, perhaps a cozy woolen sweater beneath a warm coat, complemented by a sturdy pair of boots to navigate the soon-to-be snowy streets. A stroll through one of Boston’s many parks may yield the chance to witness the first delicate flakes as they swirl in the breeze. Alternatively, a warm coffee in hand while seated by a window might best suit the evening's impending snowfall, curling up with a good book as the world outside transforms into a serene white wonderland.
